function.name: list_files
function.description: List files in a given path

path.description: An optional path to search for files, otherwise cwd

function.name: read_file
function.description: Read a file and return content with XML line numbering. Output format: <line number=N>{line content}</line> for each line. Use line numbers from output to make precise edits.

filename.description: The name of the file to read

function.name: save_memory
function.description: Save a memory. It should be in the form 'The User' or if you have the name, use the name.

function.name: read_pydoc
function.description: Show the pydoc for some object

object.description: The object to get the documentation on

function.name: read_man_section
function.description: Show a contextual snippet of a man page

parameter.description: The parameter or command to view, such as '-z' or 'compgen'

function.name: show_memory
function.description: Show all memories - check here if you do not know something
